name: Lissa's Advice
description: $(lissa)Lissa$() will come pop in now and then as you accomplish goals in the pack, advising you on cool features you should try out.$(br2)Keep an eye out for the $(#ff0000)(!)$() on the book in your inventory!$(br2)$(lissa)Beta$(): Art is uncolored, the entries start unlocked, will be colored and locked later.
